sentences.en: As the crack gets bigger, the topsoil gently slumpsand develops into a sinkhole.
sentences.cn: 但裂缝增大时,表土下降之后形成大洞.

sentences.en: His eloquence is all the more remarkable because migraines are a sinkhole for language.
sentences.cn: 他的描述很引人入胜,因为偏头疼就像是语言的排污口.

sentences.en: Local authorities and geologists are still investigating what caused the sinkhole.
sentences.cn: 当地官员及地质学家仍在调查此次地陷发生的原因.

sentences.en: The sinkhole was caused by rains and an underground sewage flow.
sentences.cn: 这个塌方的污水池是由于雨水和地下污水流动造成的。

sentences.en: To a geologist, this is a simple limestone sinkhole.
sentences.cn: 对地质学者来说, 这只是简易的石灰石污水池.
